}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ;FCC ID [https://fccid.io/U2M/-UB9700803 U2M-UB9700803] *Radio chip: [[Ralink]] RT3070L (PB25860E0, 0830ST) 1T1R SISO :[http://www.fedoraforum.org/forum/showthread.php?t=248214 148f:3070 USB ID mention]
===Features=== *Supports 802.11b/g/n 1T1R architecture with fully forward compatible :with 802.11n draft 4.0 and 802.11b/g standard. *The easiest way to upgrade your system into wireless N network. *Connect PC/NB to a wireless network using high speed USB2.0 interface. *802.11b/g/n provide further coverage, less dead spot and higher throughput. *Easy setup with Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS). *Security support WPA/WPA2 (AES, 64,128-WEP with shared-key authentication). *Wireless Multimedia Enhancements Quality of Service support :(QoS) / enhanced power saving for Dynamic Networking *RNX-EasyN1 is also fully compatible with 802.11b/g standard. *Compatible with Windows 2000, XP, Vista 32/64 bit/ MAC 10.3/10.4/10.5/10.6 *Advanced power management for Low power consumption. <!--NOTICE: RNX-EasyN1 doesn't support Linux now.-->
===Specifications=== *Interface: USB 2.0 *Standards: 802.11b/g/n *Frequency Band: 2.4 - 2.484 GHz *Wireless Data Rates: up to 150Mbps *Channels: 11 Ch (US, Canada), 13 Ch (Europe) *Modulation: OFDM: BPSK, QPSK, 16-QAM, 64-QAM, DBPSK, DQPSK, CCK *Transmitted Power: :2.412~2.472 GHz (802.11b) >= 16dBm @1~11Mbps :2.412~2.472 GHz (802.11g) >= 16dBm @6Mbps, 12dBm @54Mbps :2.412~2.472 GHz (802.11n) >= 16dBm *Security: :WPA/WPA2 (AES, 64/128-WEP with shared-key authentication) :WPS PIN, PBC (Hardware WiFi Protected Setup Button), QoS-WMM *Antenna: Printed ANT *LEDs: Link/Activity *System Requirements: Windows 2000, XP, Vista 32/64 bit, MAC 10.3/10.4/10.5/10.6 *Temperature: 0 째C - 45 째C (32 째F - 113 째F) *Humidity: 15% - 95%, Non-Condensing
